text: "The Master of the Mississippi" is the second chapter of The Life and Times of Scrooge McDuck. ==Plot== Scrooge comes to America. Here he begins to work on his uncle Pothole McDuck's boat. Scrooge has his first adventure with the Beagle Boys finding a lost treasure. The Beagles are arrested by the police and Scrooge buys his uncle's boat. The Beagles then escape and destroy Scrooge's boat. Category:DuckTales
title: The Master of the Mississippi
